summary: SummaryHighlightsCruelty FreeSustainable PackagingGive BackCurlsmith Hydro Style Flexi-Jelly is a medium hold styling gel that provides weightless definition without compromising on volume.
details: DetailsBenefitsAdds definition without drying out curls or weighing them down. Helps reduce frizz and gives soft, bouncy curls.Tames frizz whilst maintaining light, airy definitionControls frizz in humid environmentsMade for those who find gels too heavy or flatteningMade with Hyaluronic Acid, Lavender Flowers and a Green Tea BrewFeaturesBEST FOR: Weightless definitionFORMAT: JellyHOLD LEVEL:7- Medium holdColor-SafeMade without sulphates, silicones or drying alcoholsItem 2643507How To UseApply to wet hair. Rake through to ensure you are evenly coating all strands. Style as desired and leave to air dry or diffuse.IngredientsWater (Aqua/Eau), Polyquaternium-69, Glycerin, PEG-40 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Selaginella Lepidophylla Extract, Persea Gratissima (Avocado) Oil, Prunus Armeniaca (Apricot) Kernel Oil, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Ocimum Basilicum (Basil) Leaf Extract, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Extract, Salvia Officinalis (Sage) Leaf Extract, Piper Nigrum (Black Pepper) Seed Extract, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Carapa Guaianensis (Andiroba) Seed Oil, Sodium Gluconate, Carbomer, Butylene Glycol, Aminomethyl Propanol, Tocopherol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Sodium Benzoate, Potassium Sorbate, Phenoxyethanol, Iodopropynyl Butylcarbamate, Fragrance (Parfum), Citrus Limon (Lemon) Peel Oil, Limonene, Linalool, Pinene, Tetramethyl Acetyloctahydronaphthalenes.
how_to_use: Apply to wet hair. Rake through to ensure you are evenly coating all strands. Style as desired and leave to air dry or diffuse.
